attributes.action: Residents of Whitworth which to voice our real concerns at the lack of consultation with our community
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We wish to set up this online petition mainly because Lancashire County Council have failed to hold a full public consultation with members of our community on a new access roadway at Barlow Bottoms Market Street Whitworth into Whitworth Quarry's, without first holding a full public consultation with the members of our community here in Whitworth, it you share our concerns please sign up to this online petition we can win but only with your help and support

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement. Please contact your local authority in the first instance.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
